name: Healing with the Ancients
description: The Pharmaceutical Companies have imploded because of corruption and price dominance.  For years they have steered the world's population into manufactured foods, powders and supplements. Now they are no longer manufacturing the items and the world is starting to starve.  Our mission is to go out and forage for plants to reintroduce plant life for whole foods and nutrition to save the World. We must create a new Agroecological Theme for small-scale farming to conserve natural energy and preserve ways of knowing and growing agricultural for healthy local food resources.
